name: Card Game (SnoutUp)
description:
Use arrow keys, mouse or touches to move character around and interact on other cards in the grid. Use weapons and skills to fight enemies, collect coins and explore various card combinations. Currently main and only game mode is endless. 

Game is currently in active development and will get a proper title in the future.  Leave your feedback and name suggestions in the forums below!

I was heavily inspired by Look, Your Loot! and Dungeon Cards so highly recommend checking those games out if you're looking  for more complete and polished card-based dungeon crawling experience.
